title: MMR Boosting Punishments for the 2015 Season

embed.description: Hey Everyone, Through past seasons we have been dedicated to the detection and punishment of players who have been involved in MMR Boosting in one way or another.

replies.body:
It's a shame this isn't being applied to OCE yet.

But it's a good thing.

I think it is, not 100% sure tho

maybe a red can answer.
Read through the thread and you'll find a Red Post saying that these 70,000 people are across NA, and EU.
As long as playing on a smurf and stomping bads with friends isn't considered boosting. I would hate for my smurfs to get banned.

you mean duo Qing with them?

don't know if that's considered boosting tbh, i don't think its a good thing but i don't believe its against the rules.

i think its more if you get someone to jump on your account and play it from bronze to silver/gold/plat

I like, shame I can't play on my friends acc because he has every champ though

EDIT: He gave it to me so it technically isn't sharing
